title: My account got hacked and the email adress got changed and unverified.

embed.description: Post with 0 views. email was changed and unverified

body:
Hi, yesterday i tried to login to my account but my password was changed so i tried to change it aigan but then i saw that my email was changed aswell and that it was unverified, so i think i got hacked. The strange thing was that i was still logged in online on the league of legends site thats why i know the email was changed and unverified. Dont know how this is even possible.

I have already send a support ticket is there anything else i can do ? plz help.

PS: I think my account was hacked because i joined a discord server that was designed for league players to find friends of the same elo. We had to give our elo and summenor name and change our summenor icon to verify our rank.

replies.body: It's a little risky to try and do account recovery type stuff like this here on the boards, but those account agents should be able to get all of this straightened out and repaired in your ticket!
Send a support ticket. They can help you:)
